summary: The New York Yankees are a famous baseball team from the Bronx, New York City. They were founded in 1903 and are one of the most successful sports teams in the U.S., with 27 World Series wins. Originally called the New York Highlanders, they changed their name to Yankees in 1913. The team plays at Yankee Stadium and has iconic players like Babe Ruth and Derek Jeter. The Yankees are worth billions and have a big following, but also many rival fans, especially from the Boston Red Sox.
title: New York Yankees
